齠字的基本解释

齠
tiáo
见“龆”。

齠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiáo］
［《集韻》田聊切，平蕭，定。］
“龆1”的繁体字。
(1)儿童换齿，即脱去乳齿，长出恒齿。参见“齠齒”。
(2)通“髫”。孩童下垂的头发。
(3)年幼；年少。

齠字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【齒字部】　齠； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1533第25
【集韻】【正韻】?田聊切，音迢。【正韻】始毀齒也。【韓詩外傳】男子八月而生齒，八歲而齠齒。【庾信·齊王憲?】未逾齠齔，巳議論天下事。　又【集韻】丁聊切，音凋。義同。

See "龆".
shed the milk teeth
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tiáo］
["Jiyun" Tian Liaoqie, Pingxiao, Ding. ]
Traditional characters for "龆1".
(1) Children change teeth, that is, deciduous teeth are removed and permanent teeth are grown. See "small teeth".
(2) Through "髫". Child's drooping hair.
(3) Young; young.
shed the milk teeth
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 2】【Teeth word department】　龆; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1533-25
[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Tian chats and cuts, and the sound is endless. [Zheng Yun] The teeth are beginning to be destroyed. [Han Shiwai Biography] The man had teeth in August, and he had teeth at the age of eight. [Xin Yu·Wang Xian of Qi?] Not more than elders, and discussing world affairs.　[Jiyun] Ding talks and cuts, the sound fades. The same meaning.
